data.title: John Doyle
data.meta_description: MARSHALL—John Doyle, 91, of Marshall, Minnesota, died on Tuesday, April 30, 2024, at the Avera Morningside Heights Care Center in Marshall.  Funeral Services
data.text:
MARSHALL–John Doyle, 91, of Marshall, Minnesota, died on Tuesday, April 30, 2024, at the Avera Morningside Heights Care Center in Marshall. Funeral Services are 11:00 a.m. Monday, May 6, 2024, at First Lutheran Church in Marshall, Minnesota (100 Church Street, Marshall, MN 56258). A reception for attendees will follow in the church basement. Masonic and Order of the Eastern Star Services will take place at 2:30 p.m. Sunday, May 5, 2024, at the Hamilton Funeral Home in Marshall. Visitation will be held from 3:00 – 6:00 p.m. on Sunday at the Hamilton Funeral Home. The evening will conclude with a prayer service at 6:00 p.m. Visitation will then continue one hour prior to his celebration, from 10:00 – 11:00 a.m. Monday, May 6, at First Lutheran Church in Marshall. Following the Marshall reception, interment is scheduled in the Worthington Community Cemetery at 2:15 p.m. A second memorial gathering will then be at the First Lutheran Church in Worthington, Minnesota (1200 4th Ave, Worthington, MN 56187), beginning after 3:00 p.m. on Monday, May 6. Guest book, live stream link, and tribute wall are available online at www.hamiltonfh.com

Arrangements by the Hamilton Funeral Home in Marshall, Minnesota 507-532-2933 www.hamiltonfh.com
